tool_description: [Free] Simple API to find mobile phone Carrier , Country & Details
name: Phone Number Info
title: Phone Number Info

api_list.name: Phone Basic Info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://phone-number-info.p.rapidapi.com/+31637333793/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phone-number-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://phone-number-info.p.rapidapi.com/{phone}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phone-number-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
